alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 06 at 6:41PM EDT until August 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following county, Morgan. * WHEN...Until 845 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 639 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to slow-moving thunderstorms. Excessive runoff will cause minor flooding of small streams and creeks, roads, and roadside culverts in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... West Liberty, Henry, Pomp, Lick Branch, Licking River, Liberty Road, Index, Lenox, Gordon Ford, Woodsbend, Cottle, Elkfork, Omer and Ebon.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
